moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • New Bedford Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured in a motorcycle accident, you may be entitled to a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • New Bedford Workers’ Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured while being employed in New Bedford, you may be entitled to workers’ compensation benefits for your lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases, a lump sum settlement, among other losses.
  • New Bedford Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you suffered an injury from a slip and fall accident in New Bedford, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • New Bedford Social Security Disability Attorney, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    The SSD lawyers at d’Oliveira & Associates in New Bedford work with clients who have been denied Social Security Disability benefits to help them get the money they deserve.

description:
Caring, Compassionate Support For Injury Victims In Southern Massachusetts

Serving Bristol County and the rest of southern Massachusetts from our law office in New Bedford, d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. provides compassionate counsel for innocent accident victims and for those who suffered a work-related illness or injury.

Serving The Area For Over 30 Years

Founded in 1989 by personal injury attorney Paul d'Oliveira, our law firm has expanded to include five office locations throughout southern Massachusetts and 10 more across Rhode Island.

The Trusted Source For Top-Notch Advocacy

As one of the largest legal practices in the region devoted solely to personal injury, workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, we have helped thousands of clients recover the compensation and benefits they need to support themselves and their families, securing more than $200 million in settlements to date.

Recognized for our impeccable service and high level of integrity, our attorneys have received top ratings and many positive referrals from clients fully satisfied with the level of assistance and support they received from our law firm.

When you choose d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. to handle your case, you can rest assured we will do all we can to get the maximum amount possible for the losses you sustained as well as for your pain and suffering. In doing so, we will treat you and your family with the respect and dignity you deserve, and we will remain in close contact with you throughout all legal proceedings to ensure the best odds of helping you achieve the positive results you seek.

Discuss Your Case Free, No Upfront Fees

To schedule a free initial consultation concerning your situation, you can contact our law office or visit our website. We work on a contingency basis, which means we will not require you to pay a fee unless we are successful in obtaining compensation on your behalf.
